description: This is a dummy assignment for week 0 to learn how to submit assignments

In this assignment, I collected timestamps and elevator numbers that arrived in the CDS building. Our goal was to find the most optimal position to stand to minimize our walking time to the next elevator.

In this assignment, I created a KMeans Clustering Visualization where the user can input the number of clusters and choose how they want to initialize the centers. They can all also step through the algorithm or skip to the end where the data converges. They also are given the ability to generate random datasets and reset any algorithm. Demo Link: https://youtu.be/JXiVRMyyUsc

In this assignment, I applied Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) as a preprocessing step to a MNIST dataset and trained a logistic regression classifier. I then compared the model performance and training time when using different levels of SVD for dimensionality reduction.

header: Assignment 4: Latent Semantic Analysis Search Engine webpage
description: In this assignment, I developed an interactive web application that implements a basic search engine using Latent Semantic Analysis (LSA). The search engine takes a userâ€™s query, perform LSA on a pool of documents, and returns the top documents based on cosine similarity. Demo Link: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/8y-M4dweGbg

In this assignment, I implemented a K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) model from scratch to predict customer churn for a bank. My goal is to identify customers who are likely to leave the bank based on historical data.

In this assignment, I explored the impact of changing parameters on linear regression. The goal was to create an interactive webpage to demonstrate how modifying these parameters affects regression results, especially when there is no actual relationship between X and Y. By tweaking these settings, I was able to observe how randomness can influence the slope and intercept in a regression model. Youtube link 1: https://youtu.be/j-ivLliM2Yk Youtube link 2: https://youtu.be/iD5ryo-u9Mc
